# Explore and Make Histograms 

```{r make histograms}
results_house %>% 
  filter(party %in% c('REP', 'DEM', 'IND')) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  aes(x=primary_votes, fill=party) + 
  geom_histogram(position = 'dodge')
```
